idea: The Company provides a network of state-of-the-art outpatient facilities  integrating multi-specialty group practice with ancillary services such as pharmacy, diagnostic testing, and occupational therapy. It is the owner and operator of myMD brand and the chain of outpatient clinics that operate under the myMD brand. myMD provides integrated outpatient services and improved access to technology to enable doctors to devote more time to patient  care, with improved outcomes made possible by the streamlined delivery of various healthcare services. Each myMD facility is typically supported by multiple Consulting Doctors (myMD CD), thereby providing clinical coverage to patients
name: MYMD HEALTHCARE PRIVATE LIMITED
